name: rocm-core

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

description:
rocm-core is a utility which can be used to get ROCm release version. It
also provides the Lmod modules files for the ROCm release.
getROCmVersion function provides the ROCm version.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependent_to.name: rocm-openmp-extras
dependent_to.description: OpenMP support for ROCm LLVM.

dependent_to.name: rocm-clang-ocl
dependent_to.description: OpenCL compilation with clang compiler

dependent_to.name: comgr
dependent_to.description:
This provides various Lightning Compiler related services. It currently
contains one library, the Code Object Manager (Comgr)

dependent_to.name: hip
dependent_to.description:
HIP is a C++ Runtime API and Kernel Language that allows developers to
create portable applications for AMD and NVIDIA GPUs from single source
code.

dependent_to.name: rccl
dependent_to.description:
RCCL (pronounced "Rickle") is a stand-alone library of standard
collective communication routines for GPUs, implementing all-reduce,
all-gather, reduce, broadcast, and reduce-scatter.

dependent_to.name: rdc
dependent_to.description: ROCm Data Center Tool

dependent_to.name: rocm-dbgapi
dependent_to.description:
The AMD Debugger API is a library that provides all the support
necessary for a debugger and other tools to perform low level control of
the execution and inspection of execution state of AMD's commercially
available GPU architectures.

dependent_to.name: rocminfo
dependent_to.description: Radeon Open Compute (ROCm) Runtime rocminfo tool

dependent_to.name: hipify-clang
dependent_to.description:
hipify-clang is a clang-based tool for translation CUDA sources into HIP
sources

dependent_to.name: roctracer-dev
dependent_to.description:
ROC-tracer library: Runtimes Generic Callback/Activity APIs. The goal of
the implementation is to provide a generic independent from specific
runtime profiler to trace API and asyncronous activity.

dependent_to.name: hsa-rocr-dev
dependent_to.description:
This repository includes the user mode API nterfaces and libraries
necessary for host applications to launch computer kernels to available
HSA ROCm kernel agents.AMD Heterogeneous System Architecture HSA - Linux
HSA Runtime for Boltzmann (ROCm) platforms.

dependent_to.name: rocm-device-libs
dependent_to.description: set of AMD specific device-side language runtime libraries

dependent_to.name: atmi
dependent_to.description:
Asynchronous Task and Memory Interface, or ATMI, is a runtime framework
and programming model for heterogeneous CPU-GPU systems. It provides a
consistent, declarative API to create task graphs on CPUs and GPUs
(integrated and discrete).

dependent_to.name: mivisionx
dependent_to.description:
MIVisionX toolkit is a set of comprehensive computer vision and machine
intelligence libraries, utilities, and applications bundled into a
single toolkit.

dependent_to.name: hsakmt-roct
dependent_to.description:
This is a thunk python recipe to build and install Thunk Interface.
Thunk Interface is a user-mode API interfaces used to interact with the
ROCk driver.

dependent_to.name: rocm-debug-agent
dependent_to.description: Radeon Open Compute (ROCm) debug agent

dependent_to.name: rocm-bandwidth-test
dependent_to.description: Test to measure PciE bandwidth on ROCm platforms

dependent_to.name: likwid
dependent_to.description:
Likwid is a simple to install and use toolsuite of command line
applications for performance oriented programmers. It works for Intel
and AMD processors on the Linux operating system. This version uses the
perf_event backend which reduces the feature set but allows user
installs. See https://github.com/RRZE-
HPC/likwid/wiki/TutorialLikwidPerf#feature-limitations for information.

dependent_to.name: rocm-gdb

This is ROCmgdb, the ROCm source-level debugger for Linux, based on GDB,
the GNU source-level debugger.

dependent_to.name: rocm-opencl
dependent_to.description: OpenCL: Open Computing Language on ROCclr

It is a C library for Linux that provides a user space interface for
applications to monitor and control GPU applications.

rocm-cmake provides CMake modules for common build tasks in the ROCm
